name: Corner Spa Suite | 1 King
description: Corner suite in the Spa Tower featuring spa-inspired amenities, one king-size bed, and luxurious appointments. Enjoy the elevated Spa Tower experience with premium toiletries, plush robes, and access to the resort's spa facilities.
shortDescription: Luxurious corner suite in the Spa Tower with spa-inspired amenities and premium appointments.

meta.title: Corner Spa Suite 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Corner Spa Suite at Eldorado Resort Reno – luxurious spa-inspired accommodations in the Spa Tower.
